TopicTitle: Where are the contracts to Eloo, Dres and Moho?

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I am getting toward the end of a hard mode career in .90, and I am disappointed that there are not contracts to visit or perform any science on Dres, Moho and Eloo. I've been to Eve, Duna and Jool multiple times, build surface station on Bop, landed on laythe, etc. With something like 950 reputation and the entire tech tree unlocked, I am wondering what I need to do to trigger contracts to the less-visited planets. I really want a reason to build for them, because I have hardly ever been so these planets are the only real 'new' content for me.

Anyone have any Eloo contracts and know how to get them?

I don't know if going into their SOIs would open up random contracts for them, it would kill the exploration contracts however.

Explorations contracts are ordered, and the ones for these three are very late. Dres and Moho didn't turn up till I went through most of the Laythe contracts and I haven't even seen the Eeloo one yet!
